name: 3d Sound Poem by WEBmadman
description:
An experiment with spoken word in a 3 dimensional space. Slowly move around the object, pausing to listen to each part. Click/touch the hand to start audio, the head to stop. Be sure to try rotating up and down as well as side to side.

The source for this is here- http://sketchbin.webmadman.net/b4w/blender/objectest2018.blend
